data.text: Ezɨ Sabatɨn dughiam gɨvazɨma, Sanden bar mɨzaraghara aruem anadima, Makdalan amizim Maria, ko Marian igharazim uamategha mozimɨn ganasa izi.28:1 Wikbar dughiar faragh zuim, a Sandera.
Ezɨ mɨkɨmkɨzir ekiam maghɨram oto. Ezɨ Godɨn enselɨn mam Godɨn Nguibam ategha izaghira, dagɨar Iesusɨn mozir akamɨn itim poghpuegha, mong mozir apɨnimɨn ghugha, dagɨam gaperaghav iti.
28:3 Daniel 10:6; Matyu 17:2; Aposel 1:10Enselɨn ganganim, mati onɨmarim taghtazi moghɨn gari, ezɨ an korotiaba bar ghurghuri.
Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba an atiatia, inɨgha egha aremezɨ moghɨn iti.
Ezɨ ensel kamaghɨn amizir kamning mɨgei, “Gua atiatingan markɨ. Kɨ fo, gua me ter ighuvim gafuzir gumazim Iesus bagha gara izi.
28:6 Matyu 12:40; 16:21A kagh itir puvatɨ. A faragha mɨkemezɨ moghɨn a ua dɨkavigha gɨfa. Gua izɨ, a kagh irɨghav ikezir danganimɨn gan.

“Egh gua zuamɨra mangɨ, an suren gumazibav kɨm suam, a ua dɨkavigha gɨvagha mozimɨn itir puvatɨ. Ia oragh. A ia bativasa faragha Galilin Distrighɨn zui. Ia mangɨ, munagh an ganam. Kɨ bizir kamɨn gun gua mɨkɨmasa ize.”
Ezɨ amizimning puv atiatiava, egha uaghan bar akonge. Egha zuamɨra mozim ategha, ivegha Iesusɨn suren gumazibav kɨmasa zui.
Ezɨ Iesus tuavimɨn maghɨra aning bato, egha ghaze, “Mɨzarazir aghuim.” Ezɨ aning an boroghɨn ghua, an dagarimningɨn suiragha an ziam fe.
Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn aning mɨgɨa ghaze, “Gua atiatingan markɨ. Gua mangɨ, nan aveghbuabav kɨm suam, me Galilin Distrighɨn mangɨ egh munagh nan ganam.”
Amizimning Iesusɨn suren gumaziba bagha zuima, mɨdorozir gumazir mozimɨn gara ikeziba Jerusalemɨn ghuegha, otivizir araziba bar dar gun ofa gamir gumazir ekiabav keme.
Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, Judabar gumazir aruaba inigha akar mam akɨri. Egha dagɨar avɨribar mɨdorozir gumazibagh ivezegha,
28:13 Matyu 27:64egha me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, e akuima, an suren gumaziba dɨmagarimɨn izava an kuam okemegha ghue.
Eghtɨ gavmanɨn gumazir ekiam akar kam bareghtɨma, e uari a ko mɨgɨrɨgɨam akɨram, eghtɨ ia osɨmtɨziba puvatɨgham.”
Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba dagɨar kaba inigha, gumazir ekiaba mɨkemezɨ moghɨn ami. Ezɨ akar kam ghua Judabar tongɨn bar ekefegha iza dughiar kamɨn, Judaba kamaghɨra mɨgɨavɨra iti.
Ezɨ Iesusɨn suren gumazir 11pla Galilin Distrighɨn ghua, mɨghsɨar a me bativasa mɨkemezimɨn oto.
Egha me Iesusɨn garava an ziam fe, egha men marazi okam nɨghnɨsi.

28:18 Daniel 7:13-14; Matyu 11:27; Jon 3:35; 13:3; Aposel 2:36; 1 Korin 15:27; Efesus 1:20-22; Hibru 1:2; Akar Mogomem 17:14Ezɨ Iesus men boroghɨra iza kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “God nguazim ko overiam gativamin gavgaviba bar na ganɨngi.

28:19 Mak 16:15-16; Aposel 1:8Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia nguazimɨn itir nguibaba bar dar mangɨ, ikɨziba bar dar gumazamiziba, me damutɨ, me nan suren gumazamizibar otiv. Eghtɨ ia Afeziamɨn ziam ko, Otarimɨn ziam, ko Godɨn Duamɨn ziamɨn me ru.
28:20 Matyu 18:20; Jon 14:23Egh kɨ ia mɨkemezir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba, ia bar da isɨva men sure damu, eghtɨ me dar gɨn mangɨ. Ia deravɨra fogh, kɨ ia ko ikɨvɨra ikɨ mangɨtɨ, nguazir kamɨn dughiam gɨvagham.”
